Package Model

Class AIPlayerModel

java.lang.Object
Model.AIPlayerModel
public class AIPlayerModel
extends java.lang.Object
Represents an AI player.

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display()
      Display method to display AI grid in 2d-array for testing

    • setShip

      public void setShip()
      This set ship method will generate all five ships' position randomly

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      check if AI is game over. numOfHits is the number of AI ship parts that has been hit.
      Returns:
      true - numOfHits is equal to 17

    • attackedByPlayer

      public boolean attackedByPlayer​(int xPos, int yPos)
      Player fire shot to AI grid.
      Parameters:
      xPos - x-position of the shot
      yPos - y-position of the shot
      Returns:
      true - if player hit a AI ship part

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets AI grid and all variables

    • getNumOfHits

      public int getNumOfHits()
      get the number of ship part that's hit
      Returns:
      numOfHits

    • getNumOfShots

      public int getNumOfShots()
      get the number of shots AI fired
      Returns:
      numOfShots
